companies.name: OpenAI
companies.summary: ⚠️ Your content may train AI models unless you opt out. Limited data transparency.

companies.name: Anthropic
companies.summary: ⚠️ Inputs/outputs may be used for AI training. Data retention practices unclear.

companies.name: Midjourney
companies.summary: ⚠️ Collects personal and billing data; usage and sharing terms are vague.

companies.name: Google
companies.summary: ⚠️ Broad data collection with limited transparency on usage and third-party sharing.

companies.name: Microsoft
companies.summary: ⚠️ Blanket consent to collect and share sensitive personal data without ongoing notice.

companies.name: Meta
companies.summary: ⚠️ Data shared across Meta's family of apps; extent of cross-platform sharing unclear.

companies.name: X (Twitter)
companies.summary: ⚠️ Data may transfer internationally with weaker privacy protections in some regions.

companies.name: TikTok
companies.summary: ⚠️ Extensive data collection including interests, activity, and device info.

companies.name: LinkedIn
companies.summary: ⚠️ Personal data shared with Microsoft affiliates; usage scope not fully defined.

companies.name: Instagram
companies.summary: ⚠️ Broad data collection including location; unclear data retention policies.

companies.name: Pinterest
companies.summary: ⚠️ Collects personal data to profile user interests; specifics not clearly disclosed.

companies.name: Reddit
companies.summary: ⚠️ Consent to data collection required; privacy policy not easily accessible.

companies.name: Discord
companies.summary: ⚠️ Tracks active apps and games on device; extensive collection, consent unclear.

companies.name: Slack
companies.summary: ⚠️ Data ownership of user-generated content is ambiguous; rights may be disputed.

companies.name: Zoom
companies.summary: ⚠️ Scope of data collection during meetings is not clearly defined.

companies.name: Notion
companies.summary: ⚠️ Broad collection of personal info, usage data, and user-created content.

companies.name: Adobe
companies.summary: ⚠️ Terms unavailable — unable to assess data practices or user rights.

companies.name: Dropbox
companies.summary: ⚠️ Scans and accesses your files for OCR and personalization features.

companies.name: Asana
companies.summary: ⚠️ Customer data ownership may be confusing for individual vs. enterprise users.

companies.name: GitHub
companies.summary: ⚠️ Broad content license granted to GitHub; potential for unexpected usage.

companies.name: Amazon
companies.summary: ⚠️ No accessible ToS — users lack clarity on data rights and privacy practices.

companies.name: Walmart
companies.summary: ⚠️ No clear data collection disclosure or explicit user consent mechanisms.

companies.name: Shopify
companies.summary: ⚠️ Requires extensive personal/business data; necessity not clearly justified.

companies.name: Netflix
companies.summary: ⚠️ Collects device ID and payment details for offer eligibility; limited transparency.

companies.name: Disney+
companies.summary: ⚠️ Broad collection of viewing habits, preferences, and device data.

companies.name: Spotify
companies.summary: ⚠️ Mandatory arbitration limits users' right to pursue legal action in court.

companies.name: Twitch
companies.summary: ⚠️ Privacy notice lacks specifics on data types collected and how they're shared.

companies.name: YouTube
companies.summary: ⚠️ Data processing terms reference AI training but lack clear user-facing detail.

companies.name: Hulu
companies.summary: ⚠️ User data shared with third-party advertisers; limited opt-out details.

companies.name: Max
companies.summary: ⚠️ Scope of personal data collected is vaguely defined in the ToS.

companies.name: Uber
companies.summary: ⚠️ Mandatory arbitration waives jury trial and class action rights.

companies.name: Airbnb
companies.summary: ⚠️ Arbitration clause and class action waiver limit legal recourse for U.S. users.

companies.name: DoorDash
companies.summary: ⚠️ Terms of Service inaccessible — no transparency on privacy or user rights.

companies.name: Lyft
companies.summary: ⚠️ Collects extensive location and ride data; breadth of collection is concerning.

companies.name: Grubhub
companies.summary: ⚠️ May create accounts using transaction data without explicit user consent.

companies.name: TaskRabbit
companies.summary: ⚠️ Data practices governed by a separate policy not prominently linked or explained.

companies.name: JPMorgan Chase
companies.summary: ⚠️ Broad consent to share data across the JPMorgan group and third parties.

companies.name: PayPal
companies.summary: ⚠️ Mandatory individual arbitration limits class action and court remedies.

companies.name: Stripe
companies.summary: ⚠️ Types of collected data are not clearly disclosed; transparency concerns.

companies.name: Venmo
companies.summary: ⚠️ Broad collection of personal, financial, and transaction data; privacy risks.

companies.name: Robinhood
companies.summary: ⚠️ No mention of data collection practices; users lack informed consent details.

companies.name: Coinbase
companies.summary: ⚠️ Arbitration agreement waives jury trial and class action rights.

companies.name: Tesla
companies.summary: ⚠️ Terms restricted/inaccessible — users cannot review rights or obligations.

companies.name: Ford
companies.summary: ⚠️ Terms unavailable due to timeout — data practices unknown.

companies.name: United Airlines
companies.summary: ⚠️ Terms unavailable due to timeout — user rights unclear.

companies.name: Marriott
companies.summary: ⚠️ User feedback surrendered to Marriott without compensation or confidentiality.

companies.name: Delta Airlines
companies.summary: ⚠️ Terms lack any data collection or privacy information.

companies.name: Hilton
companies.summary: ⚠️ No data collection specifics provided; users left uninformed of practices.

companies.name: Apple
companies.summary: ⚠️ Monitors user activity for compliance; scope and purpose not clearly stated.

companies.name: Samsung
companies.summary: ⚠️ Collects sensitive data including SSNs and payment info; high breach risk.

companies.name: Steam
companies.summary: ⚠️ Data collection scope beyond billing and account info is not disclosed.

companies.name: Epic Games
companies.summary: ⚠️ Requires accurate personal data; full extent of collection unclear.

companies.name: Roblox
companies.summary: ⚠️ Unclear data collection practices; user-generated content rights ambiguous.

companies.name: Zillow
companies.summary: ⚠️ Terms inaccessible — users cannot review data and privacy rights.

companies.name: Redfin
companies.summary: ⚠️ Vague definition of collected content raises scope and privacy concerns.

companies.name: Coursera
companies.summary: ⚠️ Grants broad, perpetual, worldwide license over all user-created content.

companies.name: Duolingo
companies.summary: ⚠️ May collect extensive personal and usage data without clear limits.

companies.name: Uber Eats
companies.summary: ⚠️ No specific ToS available — data handling and user rights are unknown.

companies.name: FanDuel
companies.summary: ⚠️ Access denied to ToS — no data usage policy visible to users.

companies.name: Fitbit
companies.summary: ⚠️ Linked to Google account; data shared under Google's broader privacy terms.
